Reviews.Title: Super Fashionable Strap!
Reviews.Author: Michelle E. Mayfield
Reviews.Content: I like that the strap is really wide and comfy. Very soft feel yet feels secure around neck. I definitely recommend if you want to jazz up the look of your camera. I have the red Nikon D3200 and it looks great with the red! I love it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Dena K Cassel
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a charity event at the zoo but love it so much I have kept it on my camera all the time.  It looks sooo cool!

Reviews.Title: Never received it!
Reviews.Author: Laura Wolfenstein
Reviews.Content: Was sent to the main post office  instead of the house.  Main post office is in opposite direction from town or work and about 10-15 miles away.  I work 9 hour days and the post office has crazy hours.  Couldn't get there to pick it up.  Was told by seller that I needed to go there to get it or go there and get the name of the post office worker if they said package was not there...  I PAID to have this delivered to MY HOUSE.  It is the SELLER's responsibility to make sure it gets to MY HOUSE.  They refused to assist.  I am still waiting for this to be resolved and it has been 3 months!!!  Do not use this seller!!!

Reviews.Title: Yayyyyy!!
Reviews.Author: Angela Jones
Reviews.Content: I take pictures and i wanted a different stap for my camera its totally awesome and more comfortable than the one you get with your dslr camera ....love it

Reviews.Title: Granddaughter was pleased
Reviews.Author: Libra Sun-Libra Moon "Libra Sun-Libra Moon"
Reviews.Content: Bought this strap to go with camera I gave my granddaughter at Xmas.  She loves zebra print and was very happy with this strap.  Looks great.  Nice quality.

Reviews.Title: Daughter Love it
Reviews.Author: Dennis Holland
Reviews.Content: Item is as described and very comfortable strap.  I purchased this for as a gift for my daughter and she love it.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Strap
Reviews.Author: Taylor H
Reviews.Content: Very sleek and stylish. Bought for girlfriend, and she absolutely loves it. It's very comfortable, a little long, but a little long is better than too short. Great strap at a great price. Will definitely recommend this item and consider this store for future needs.
